Global Variables

viewProfile.views.delete_profile(request)[source]¶

This delete_profile method is used to delete the users information from database.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – It’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

If a patient is logged in, it will remove patient’s information.

If a doctor is logged in, it will remove doctor’s information.

Return type

HttpResponse.

viewProfile.views.view_profile(request)[source]¶

This view_profile method is used to retrieve information from database to display doctors and patients profile.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – It’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

If a patient is logged in, it returns a HTML page that displays patients profile.

If a doctor is logged in, it returns a HTML page that displays doctors profile.

Return type

HttpResponse.
